episodes.name: Orphans
episodes.overview: Rancher Fiona Nolan and her found family of orphans must unite their neighbors against the cutthroat Van Ness family after an incursion on their land.

episodes.name: The Hunt
episodes.overview: The two clans are forced to set aside their enmity to hunt down a threat to the town. Fiona and Dahlia receive a visit from an old friend.

episodes.name: Triage
episodes.overview: Constance tries to broker a deal with dangerous implications. Elias and Trisha's budding attraction grows stronger. Fiona cares for a wounded man.

episodes.name: Motherly Purpose
episodes.overview: When Constance offers Albert an opportunity, Fiona is suspicious of her motives. Lilla struggles with the competing demands of family and identity.

episodes.name: The Joaquins
episodes.overview: Interlopers sow chaos on a solemn occasion for the Van Ness family. Fiona weighs a proposal that could determine the future of Angel's Ridge.

episodes.name: Piety and Rage
episodes.overview: After overstepping their bounds, Constance and Fiona each face mutinies from within. Garret is forced to get his hands dirty.

episodes.name: This Was Meant to Be My Peace
episodes.overview: The Van Ness clan and the Orphans ready for an epic showdown, forcing members of both families to decide where their loyalties really lie.
